Package game

Interface ZombieWorld

All Known Subinterfaces:
ActorInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor, Farmer, Human, Player, Zombie, ZombieActor
public interface ZombieWorld
An Actor of the ZombieWorld game implements these interfaces to determine the type of ZombieActor it is, whether a ZombieActor has limbs and can have its limbs knocked off and determine whether it is able to revive itself after being killed.
Author:
Isaac Lee Kian Min

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default boolean ableToRevive()
    In the ZombieWorld, a ZombieActor is unable to revive after being killed, unless...
    java.lang.Enum<?> getTypeOfZombieActor()
    Get this Type of ZombieActor in the ZombieWorld.
    default java.lang.String knockOffLimb​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
    An Actor in the ZombieWorld can have its limbs knocked off if it has limbs.

  • Method Details

    • getTypeOfZombieActor

      java.lang.Enum<?> getTypeOfZombieActor()
      Get this Type of ZombieActor in the ZombieWorld. Implement this method to get the types of ZombieActor in the ZombieWorld.
      Returns:
      type of ZombieActor.

    • knockOffLimb

      default java.lang.String knockOffLimb​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      An Actor in the ZombieWorld can have its limbs knocked off if it has limbs. Override this method to determine how an Actor that has limbs may have its limbs knocked off it or none.
      Parameters:
      map - the map where the current ZombieActor is.
      Returns:
      a default value of null.

    • ableToRevive

      default boolean ableToRevive()
      In the ZombieWorld, a ZombieActor is unable to revive after being killed, unless... Override this method to determine whether a ZombieActor can revive.
      Returns:
      a default value of false.
